welcome_message: A revolution in decentralized communication and digital identity.
guide_wallet_text: To connect your wallet, click 'Connect Wallet' on the dashboard and approve via MetaMask.
guide_chat_text: Our decentralized chat works with wallet-to-wallet messaging using XMTP protocol.
guide_token_text: AI will analyze destination wallet before sending. Green = safe, Yellow = suspicious, Red = dangerous.
guide_language_text: Use the top-right dropdown to switch between 9 supported languages with a single click.
